snippet: At When Pigs Fly South, a modest eatery in Sharon that resembles a Southern roadside barbecue shack, the pigs that matter most are those from which its plates of ribs and pork shoulders are derived.
abstract: Christopher Brooks reviews When Pigs Fly South restaurant in Sharon, CT (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: At When Pigs Fly South, a modest eatery in Sharon that resembles a Southern roadside barbecue shack, the pigs that matter most are those from which its plates of ribs and pork shoulders are derived.

headline.seo: A Review of When Pigs Fly South, in Sharon
headline.main: Barbecue, Jambalaya and Points in Between
headline.print_headline: Barbecue, Jambalaya and Points in Between
